PN_Action_Taxonomy.goal: Close the 'Black Hole' delay and establish early alignment

action_items: Confirm insurance eligibility (Straight Medicare vs. Advantage)
Verify diagnosis meets home care criteria
Gather DOB, phone, address, and POA details
Check distance for Medical Assistant (MA) travel
Meet patient in-person within first 48 hours
Shadow the Traditional Provider (TP) to get facility entry
primary_intents: Gain trust and prepare patient for transition

action_items: Contact Social Worker (SW) and TP immediately upon assignment
Review clinical notes in DocNow/Atlantis
primary_intents: Maintain relationship for early discharge info

PN_Action_Taxonomy.goal: Track progress and mitigate 'Timeline Drift' or stakeholder 'Steering'

action_items: Monitor progress via SNF updates and NP round notes
Take part in wound rounds with providers
primary_intents: Ensure awareness of barriers or changes in progress

action_items: Maintain weekly communication with staff/SW
Attend facility care conferences
primary_intents: Ensure immediate updates if discharge plans shift

action_items: Educate patient/family on program benefits
Discuss POA awareness of home services
Learn PCP and HHA preferences well in advance
Identify family support/training needs

PN_Action_Taxonomy.goal: Deliver a 'Maximum Reward' handoff and secure service adoption

action_items: Talk with SW to confirm D/C date and HHA selection
Confirm no address/contact changes
primary_intents: Ensure alignment with all transition providers

action_items: Pass contact/address info and first appointment availability to home team
primary_intents: Prepare home team for continuity of care

action_items: Provide physical appointment card with Care Coordinator info
Confirm time works for patient/DM
primary_intents: Ensure patient feels informed and comfortable

action_items: Coordinate with Regional Director (RD) and HHA to prevent same-day 'Double Dipping'
primary_intents: Ensure service payment and coverage safety
